name: Mycotic
description:
Relaxing puzzle game where the goal is to cover entire levels in the lowest expansion steps possible.

You take on the role of a mycelium network which has to expand all over the forest. You can conquer grass and trees (they grant you expansion power), but not rocks.

This game was made in a week for the Global Game Jam TecnoCampus 2023:

  • GGJ TecnoCampus 2023 Game Website.
  • GGJ TecnoCampus 2023.

Controls:

Left Mouse Click a mycelium tile to expand.

Right Mouse Click + Drag to rotate camera.

Team:

  • Pol Muñoz (programming, game design)
  • Gerard Parareda (art, game design, programming)
  • Roger Cecilia (game design, programming)

Music & Sounds:

  • Earth Sound Effects
  • Wind Sound Effects
  • Free Menu Sound Pack UI Sounds v2
  • Cassette from Shapeforms
